text: Jose Armando R. Melo (May 30, 1932 - October 18, 2020) was a Filipino lawyer and jurist. He was an Associate Justice of the Supreme Court of the Philippines from 1992 to 2002. He is a former Chairman of the Commission on Elections (COMELEC). ==References== Category:Filipino judges Category:1932 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Lawyers from Manila
title: Jose Melo
